Identifier.Name: lifeExpectancy
Identifier.Description: Life expectacy for working-age sims. A measure of citywide health.

Identifier.Name: educationQuotent
Identifier.Description: Measures how educated your sims are.

Identifier.Name: workforcePercentage
Identifier.Description: Percentage of sims aged 20-55 in your city.

Identifier.Name: yearOfFounding
Identifier.Description: The year your city was founded (1900, 1950, 2000 or 2050).

Identifier.Name: daysSinceFounding
Identifier.Description: Number of sunrises your city has seen (1 month = 25 days, always).

Identifier.Name: neighborSize1
Identifier.Description: City size of your first neighbor.

Identifier.Name: neighborSize2
Identifier.Description: City size of your second neighbor.

Identifier.Name: neighborSize3
Identifier.Description: City size of your third neighbor.

Identifier.Name: neighborSize4
Identifier.Description: City size of your forth neighbor.

Identifier.Name: pollution
Identifier.Description: A measure of pollution in your city.

Identifier.Name: traffic
Identifier.Description: Measures the effectiveness of your transportation system.

Identifier.Name: crime
Identifier.Description: A measure of crime in your city.

Identifier.Name: populationDensity
Identifier.Description: Average population density in your city.

Identifier.Name: populationGrowth
Identifier.Description: Average population growth in your city.
